# Touch Screen Mode

The LCD monitor also functions as a touch screen.

## Shooting Touch Controls

To enable touch controls, select ON for:

**BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING.**

!Touch Screen Settings

## EVF

The LCD monitor can be used to select the focus area while pictures are being framed in the electronic viewfinder (EVF). Use:

**BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > TOUCH SCREEN SETTING > EVF TOUCH SCREEN AREA SETTINGS**

to choose the area of the monitor employed for touch controls.

!EVF Touch Controls
